what: Encodes datasets for prediction and dimension reduction

text: generative encoding method - ideas stemming linear Singular Value Decomposition, geometric Procrustes, statistical Canonical Correlation Analysis, neural network Autoencoder.

Extract configuration parameters of gcode — extract_config
text: verbose Print statements? i_dim Dimension reduction samples (assumed along rows) j_dim Dimension reduction features (assumed along columns) min_iter Minimum iteration gcode max_iter Maximum iteration gcode n_cores Number CPU cores, used prediction tol Tolerance threshold convergence (metric: Root Mean Squared Error) init Initialisation method model ("random","eigen-quick","eigen-dense","svd-quick","svd-dense")

what: Generative Encoding via Generalised Canonical Procrustes — gcode
title: Generative Encoding via Generalised Canonical Procrustes — gcode
text: method uses likelihood model align multiple datasets via encoding lower dimensional space. parameters can used reduce either feature sample dimensions smaller subspace embedding prediction. run default, data list required - please review config parameters gcode::extract_config(T)  .

title: Generative Encoding via Generalised Canonical Procrustes — gcode
code: gcode(   data_list,   config = gcode::extract_config(verbose = F),   transfer = gcode::extract_transfer_framework(verbose = F),   recover = gcode::extract_recovery_framework(verbose = F),   join = gcode::extract_join_framework(verbose = F) )

title: Generative Encoding via Generalised Canonical Procrustes — gcode
text: data_list List data matrices varying dimensionality. Attempts find similarities among datasets core structure. config Configuration parameters (required, default provided) transfer Transferring pre-trained model parameters (required) recover Important information used prediction imputation (required) join Join parameters share axes similar (required)

title: Generative Encoding via Generalised Canonical Procrustes — gcode
text: Main parameters contains learned model parameters. alpha beta matrix multiply example datasets x y , (K)(Y)(v) (L)(X)(u). multiplying parameter, dimension samples features can dimensionally reduced visualisation analysis embedding projection. Code contains learned shared encoding space. encoded space refers full dimension reduction samples features matrix multiplication parameters K v y, well , L u x. decode estimation full matrix dataset, code used matrix multiplied t(K)(Y_code)t(v), t(L)(X_code)t(u) calculate decoded estimation. Recover contains list predictions test dataset indicated 1 binary prediction matrices. prediction occurs shared lower dimensional space data sets list projected using common latent code.
